title: Project 64 1.7.0.50.Ver.23 LATEST + PLUGINS
description:
ChangeLog;

App Project64.exe



1.7.0.50 - ver 23


ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Redesigned settings dialog to use more modern vertical pages instead of tabs

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Plugins can now be set per rom

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Added Soft Reset function (resets only game, like pushing reset button on console, default shortcut F1, old Hard Reset now defaults SHIFT+F1).

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â When app loses focus in fullscreen make sure it is in window mode, should improve stability on fullscreen error messages.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Max cheats per game raised to 50,000

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â changed how settings is used globally

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â new setting: allow user to edit VI Refresh rate (see http://forum.pj64-emu.com/showpost.php?p=4457&postcount=18)

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â changed internal of how settings work

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Cleaned up rom browser refresh to remove more unneeded refreshes (Windows returning files in different orders)

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â re-arranged project source files (please report new errors!)

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â changed how languages is used globally

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â optimized writing to ini file

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â added RDB editor mode and indicator (see hidden settings info)

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â updated Help menu

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â updates to video plugin interface for ROM settings
 
These changes are cumulative since b49 (include all the alpha builds). Does not include minor fixes and regressions between alpha builds. 

Note: this build requires updated plugins for the per-rom settings and some other things to work properly, please use all our latest plugins!
